    • Method Detail

      • getTrackedStocks

        List<String> getTrackedStocks(String username)
        Returns a List of stock symbols being tracked by a specific user
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        Returns:
        list of stock symbols

      • trackStock

        boolean trackStock(String username,
                 String stock,
                 boolean track)
        Sets whether or not a stock is to be tracked
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        stock - stock symbol to track
        track - true to track, false to untrack
        Returns:
        true or false

      • isStockTracked

        boolean isStockTracked(String username,
                     String stock)
        Tests if a stock is being tracked for a specific user
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        stock - stock symbol to check
        Returns:
        true if tracked, false otherwise

      • userExists

        boolean userExists(String username)
        Checks if a user exists in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise

      • createUser

        User createUser(String username,
              String password)
        Creates a new user in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        a User object if doesn't exist, null otherwise

      • updateUser

        boolean updateUser(User user)
        Updates the current users information
        Parameters:
        user - a User object instance
        Returns:
        true if updated, false otherwise

      • getUser

        User getUser(String username)
        Gets the specified user's information
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        a User object if exists, null otherwise

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(String username)
        Deletes the specified user's information
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
        Checks if the specified user is logged in
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if logged in, false otherwise

      • setLoginStatus

        boolean setLoginStatus(String username,
                     boolean status)
        Sets the login status of the specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        status - the login status to set (true or false)
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getLoggedInUsers

        List<String> getLoggedInUsers()
        Returns a list of all logged in users
        Returns:
        list of logged in users

      • getUserInfo

        UserInfo getUserInfo(String username)
        Retrieves the user information associated with the specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        a UserInfo object or null
